short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn NCT tokens browsing the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension rewards individuals for the data they provide by simply browsing the internet. The extension securely shares data with PolySwarm, creating a collective defense across the globe to combat malware.
